A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I didn't think you could make a worse film than the force awakens\, how wrong I was. From start to finish this film can't decide on a tone\, has ruined what little interest I had in any of the characters or plot threads and killed off everyone that was interesting.  When the movie-going public descends upon Lukasfilm and drags the people responsible for this film into the street and slaps two telephone poles together to crucify them\, I will be there to personally hand them the nails.
